"use strict";

var TokenInfoDictionary = require("../dict/TokenInfoDictionary.js");


/**
 * Builder used to create TokenInfoDictionary
 *
 * // TODO @param {boolean} is_normalize_entry Whether entries normalize NKFC or not
 */
function TokenInfoDictionaryBuilder(/*is_normalize_entry*/) {
    this.dictionary_entries = {};  // using as hashmap, string -> string (word_id -> surface_form)
}

TokenInfoDictionaryBuilder.prototype.addEntries = function (entries) {
    this.dictionary_entries.concat(entries);
};

TokenInfoDictionaryBuilder.prototype.build = function () {
    return TokenInfoDictionary.buildDictionary(this.dictionary_entries);
};


module.exports = TokenInfoDictionaryBuilder;
